mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH (MATCH_NO, FIELD_NO, HOME_TEAM, AWAY_TEAM, MATCH_DATE, MATCH_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_MATCH.NEXTVAL, #{fieldNo}, #{homeTeam}, #{awayTeam}, TO_DATE(#{matchDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{matchTime})
mapper.select: SELECT MATCH_NO, HOME_TEAM, HOME_TEAM_NAME, HOME_TEAM_LOGO, AWAY_TEAM, AWAY_TEAM_NAME, AWAY_TEAM_LOGO, MATCH_TIME, FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, TO_CHAR(MATCH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MATCH_DATE, STATUS FROM V_TEAM_MATCH WHERE (HOME_TEAM = 2 OR AWAY_TEAM = 2) AND MATCH_DATE > SYSDATE AND STATUS = 'R' ORDER BY MATCH_DATE

SELECT MATCH_NO, HOME_TEAM, HOME_TEAM_NAME, HOME_TEAM_LOGO, AWAY_TEAM, AWAY_TEAM_NAME, AWAY_TEAM_LOGO, MATCH_TIME, FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, TO_CHAR(MATCH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MATCH_DATE, STATUS FROM V_TEAM_MATCH WHERE (HOME_TEAM = 2 OR AWAY_TEAM = 2) AND MATCH_DATE < SYSDATE AND STATUS IN ('R', 'D') ORDER BY MATCH_DATE DESC
